sense.gloss: to convey, to report, to transmit, to communicate, to tell, to impart, to propagate, to teach, to bequeath
means of making contact, intermediary, go-between
transmission (e.g. news, chemical signals, electricity), communication, delivery, conveyance, transfer, relay, propagation, conduction
to spread (of a rumour, news, etc.), to travel, to circulate, to go around, to be passed around, to become known
to be handed down (from generation to generation), to be passed down
to be introduced (to a country, region, etc.), to be brought, to come
to be conveyed (of a feeling, impression, etc.), to be felt, to come across
to travel (of sound, electricity, etc.), to propagate, to be conducted, to be transmitted
to go along, to move along

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: 「↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってくれてありがとう」「どういたしまして」
sdata.e: Thank you for helping me. "Don't mention it."

sdata.j: ↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓する↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓するよう、↑彼↑↓かれ↓らに↑伝↑↓つた↓えてください。
sdata.e: Tell them to call me before they leave.

sdata.j: すぐに↑伝票↑↓でんぴょう↓をお↑持↑↓も↓ちします。
sdata.e: I'll bring you the bill immediately.

sdata.j: やるべきことがたくさんあります。↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってほしいですか。
sdata.e: There's quite a lot of things to do; do you want some help?

sdata.j: 「どなたか↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓って↑戴↑↓いただ↓けませんか？」「はい。↑私↑↓わたし↓でよろしければ。」
↑暇↑↓ひま↓だったら、↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってください。
sdata.e: If you are free, give me a hand.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓うべきだった。
sdata.e: You should have helped him with his work.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You should tell him the truth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓を↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better tell him the truth.

words.gloss: to convey, to report, to transmit, to communicate, to tell, to impart, to propagate, to teach, to bequeath
